name: The Curse of Miles Prince
description:
The Curse of Miles Prince is a horror platformer game that was created for Scream Jam 2019. Play through a series of Miles' nightmares where if he dies, he will never wake up. Good luck, and sweet dreams.

For anyone on an OS other than Windows, I do not have the ability to test on other platforms, if you'd like to try it you can message me on the scream jam discord!

WARNING:

This game contains references to depression and suicide, as well as some images that select individuals may find disturbing. This game also contains fast paced motion and flashing lights. Play at your own discretion.
